cause.description:
To transform the lives of homeless or at-risk single moms and their children by providing safe, affordable housing and holistic mentoring to guide them from crisis to long-term stability and independence.
1. From Homelessness to Hope, One Family at a Time.
2. Fellowship Housing truly believes that if you change the life of a mom, you change generations to come.
cause.mission: From Homelessness to Hope, One Family at a Time.
cause.name: Fellowship Housing Corporation
